replace:
$0

<xf:set var="$fsReviewmapBody">
	<xf:inforow>{{ phrase('fs_reviewmap_contents_can_be_controlled_via_reviewmap_options') }}</xf:inforow>
</xf:set>
<xf:macro name="rebuild_job"
		  arg-header="{{ phrase('fs_rebuild_thread_sitemap') }}"
		  arg-body="{$fsReviewmapBody}"
		  arg-job="FS\ReviewsMap:ThreadSitemap" />
